description: Episodes grouped by Seasons on Netflix.

episodes.name: I'm Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the Pirate King!
episodes.overview: A group of pirates lead by Alvida plunder a ship, only to find a barrel which contains a strange boy named Luffy. Luffy is on a mission to find the legendary treasure "One Piece" and he befriends the ship's cabin-boy, Coby, who actually wants to become a marine officer. Luffy defeats Alvida and the two journey on in search of crewmates.

episodes.name: The Great Swordsman Appears! Pirate Hunter, Roronoa Zoro
episodes.overview: Luffy and Coby arrive at Shell Island, a Marine base. They meet the bounty hunter Roronoa Zoro, held under arrest by the infamous marine, Captain Morgan, and his son Helmeppo.

episodes.name: The First Line of Defense? The Giant Whale Laboon Appears!
episodes.overview: Upon entering the Grand Line, the ship is swallowed by a giant whale, inside of which they discover a strange place. In addition, they are not the only ones there.

episodes.name: A Promise Between Men! Luffy and the Whale Vow to Meet Again!
episodes.overview: After hearing the story of Laboon the whale, Luffy comes up with a clever solution to his problems. From Laboon's caretaker, Crocus, the crew learns more about the Grand Line and how to navigate through it, since compasses are useless there.

name: Netflix Seasons
